General.Name: An-Shin Food Services Co Ltd
General.Description: An-Shin Food Services Co.,Ltd. operates a chain of fast food restaurants under the MOS BURGER name in Taiwan and Mainland China. It offers main meals, including hamburger, rice burger, hot dog, sandwich, cakes, etc.; snacks, such as nuggets, fried chicken, fries, salad, konnyaku, deserts, ice cream etc.; and soups and soft drinks comprising of hot drinks, cold drinks, juice, milk, soup, coffee, etc. The company also provides other products that consist of gift box, souvenir, MOS card, etc.; and information software integration services. An-Shin Food Services Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

1.Name: Mr. Chi-Yin  Shih
1.Title: Accounting Supervisor, Accounting Officer, Financial Officer, Assistant GM, VP & Company Sec.

3.Name: Mr. Hung-Tao  Chen
3.Title: Chief Audit Exec. & Internal Audit Officer
